text:
Would love to see some 'experimental' #treatment 💊 data from #Chloroquine or #Hydroxychloroquine (CQ or HCQ) and #Zinc (Zn) as well. 

Think the basic science behind the idea makes sense, but haven't been studies released on it *to my knowledge* 🤔

#COVID19 💊 #CoronaVirus https://t.co/Cziap6OD1T
